required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effect on Structural Changes in Airways, Measured by MSCT, of Twice Daily 60mg AZD9668 for 12 Weeks in Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD) Patients
clinical_study.official_title: A 12-week, Phase II, Double-blind, Placebo-Controlled, Randomised, Parallel-Group, Multi-Centre Study to Assess the Effect of 60mg AZD9668 Administered Orally Twice Daily on Structural Changes in the Airways by Multi-Slice Computed Tomography in Patients With Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease.

brief_summary.textblock: The primary objective of the study is to evaluate structural changes effected by AD9668 in the airways of adults with Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD) by Multi-Slice Computed Tomography (MSCT)

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: AWT-Pi10 (Airway Wall Thickness of a Theoretical Airway With an Internal Perimeter of 10 mm)
primary_outcome.description: AWT-Pi10 (mm) as a measure of structural changes in airways. End of treatment Least Squares Mean.

secondary_outcome.description: 5th Generation Wall Area Percentage as a measure of structural changes in airways. End of treatment Least Squares Mean.

secondary_outcome.measure: Air Trapping Index (ATI) on Expiratory Scans
secondary_outcome.description: ATI Percentage as a measure of structural changes in airways. End of treatment Least Squares Mean.
Inspiratory Capacity (L) as a measure of lung function. End of treatment Least Squares Mean.
Total Lung Capacity (L) as a measure of lung function. End of treatment Least Squares Mean.
Functional Residual Capacity (L) as a measure of lung function. End of treatment Least Squares Mean.
Residual volume (L) as a measure of lung function. End of treatment Least Squares Mean.
Specific Airway Conductance as a measure of lung function. End of treatment Least Squares Mean.

secondary_outcome.measure: Pre-bronchodilator Diffusion Capacity of Carbon Monoxide (DLco)
secondary_outcome.description: Capacity of Carbon Monoxide as a measure of lung function. End of treatment Least Squares Mean.

secondary_outcome.measure: Pre-bronchodilator Forced Expiratory Volume in 1 Second (FEV1)
secondary_outcome.description: Forced Expiratory Volume in 1 second (L) as a measure of lung function, measured before bronchodilator (salbutamol) use in the clinic. End of treatment value or Last Observation Carried Forward (LOCF).

secondary_outcome.measure: Post-bronchodilator Forced Expiratory Volume in 1 Second (FEV1)
secondary_outcome.description: Forced Expiratory Volume in 1 second (L) as a measure of lung function, measured after bronchodilator (salbutamol) use in the clinic. End of treatment value or Last Observation Carried Forward (LOCF).
Forced Vital Capacity (L) as a measure of lung function, measured before bronchodilator (salbutamol) use in the clinic. End of treatment value or Last Observation Carried Forward (LOCF).
Forced Vital Capacity (L) as a measure of lung function, measured after bronchodilator (salbutamol) use in the clinic. End of treatment value or Last Observation Carried Forward (LOCF).
Slow Vital Capacity (L) as a measure of lung function, measured before bronchodilator (salbutamol) use in the clinic. End of treatment value or Last Observation Carried Forward (LOCF).
Slow Vital capacity (L) as a measure of lung function, measured after bronchodilator (salbutamol) use in the clinic. End of treatment value or Last Observation Carried Forward (LOCF).

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Average from measurements recorded daily by patient in last 6 weeks of treatment.
secondary_outcome.description: Peak Expiratory Flow (L/min) as a measure of lung function, measured at home by the patient each morning.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Average from measurements recorded daily by patient in last 6 weeks of treatment.
secondary_outcome.description: Peak Expiratory Flow (L/min) as a measure of lung function, measured at home by the patient each evening .

secondary_outcome.measure: Forced Expiratory Volume in 1 Second (FEV1) Morning (Daily Recordings)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Average from measurements recorded daily by patient in last 6 weeks of treatment.
secondary_outcome.description: Forced Expiratory Volume in 1 second (L) as a measure of lung function, measured at home by the patient each morning.

secondary_outcome.measure: Forced Expiratory Volume in 1 Second (FEV1) Evening (Daily Recordings)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Average from measurements recorded daily by patient in last 6 weeks of treatment.
secondary_outcome.description: Forced Expiratory Volume in 1 second (L) as a measure of lung function, measured at home by the patient each evening.

secondary_outcome.measure: Breathlessness, Cough and Sputum Scale (BCSS) Total Score
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Average from measurements recorded daily by patient in last 6 weeks of treatment.
secondary_outcome.description: Breathlessness, Cough and Sputum Scale, patient reported questionnaire as a measure of respiratory symptoms (reported on a 0 (best health status) to 12 (worst possible status) scale).

secondary_outcome.measure: EXAcerbations of Chronic Pulmonary Disease Tool (EXACT) Total Score
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Average from measurements recorded daily by patient in last 6 weeks of treatment.
secondary_outcome.description: EXAcerbations of Chronic pulmonary disease Tool, patient questionnaire as a measure of respiratory symptoms (reported as units on a 0 (best health status) to 100 (worst possible status) scale).

secondary_outcome.measure: St George's Respiratory Questionnaire for COPD Patients (SGRQ-C) Overall Score
secondary_outcome.description: St George's Respiratory Questionnaire for Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease, as a measure of Quality of Life (reported on a % scale from 0 (best health status) to 100(worst possible status)).

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Reliever Free Days in Last Six Weeks of Treatment
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Average from measurements recorded daily by patient in last 6 weeks of treatment.
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of reliever free days in last 6 weeks on treatment.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Exacerbations were recorded at all study visits (after 1, 4, 8, and 12 weeks of treatment and at follow up)
secondary_outcome.description: Number of patients experiencing disease exacerbations on treatment.

intervention.description: 2 x 30 mg oral tablets twice daily (bid) for 12 weeks
2 x matched placebo to oral tablet twice daily (bid) for 12 weeks

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Diagnosis of COPD with symptoms over 1 year
- FEV1/FVC < 70% and FEV1 >= 40 and < =70 % of predicted post-bronchodilator
- Ex-smokers for at least 12 months
Exclusion Criteria:
- Past history or current evidence of clinically significant heart disease
- Current diagnosis of asthma
- Worsening of COPD requiring hospitalisation and/or treatment with antibiotics and/or an increase in inhaled steroid dose and/or oral steroids within 4 weeks of study visit 1b

overall_official.affiliation: Gentofte Hospital, Department of Lung Medicine

participant_flow.recruitment_details: First patient enrolled: 06 January 2010; Last patient completed: 17 November 2010; Twelve centres across 5 countries participated in this study: Canada (2), Denmark (3), The Netherlands (2), Romania (2) and Ukraine (3).
participant_flow.pre_assignment_details: Tiotropium maintenance therapy and reliever medication were commenced at screening, except for patients on inhaled corticosteroids (ICS, ICS/LABA) who were required to stop these at enrolment and commence on tiotropium and reliever medication at the same time. These patients received tiotropium for a period of at least 3 weeks before screening.

outcome.title: AWT-Pi10 (Airway Wall Thickness of a Theoretical Airway With an Internal Perimeter of 10 mm)
outcome.description: AWT-Pi10 (mm) as a measure of structural changes in airways. End of treatment Least Squares Mean.
outcome.population: The efficacy analysis set for each outcome measure includes those patients who received at least one dose of investigational product and for whom a baseline and at least one post-randomisation measurement is available for that outcome measure. Patients were analysed by to randomised treatment in accordance with the intention to treat principle.

measure.title: Exacerbations
measure.description: Number of patients experiencing disease exacerbations on treatment.
measure.population: The efficacy analysis set for each outcome measure includes those patients who received at least one dose of investigational product and for whom a baseline and at least one post-randomisation measurement is available for that outcome measure. Patients were analysed by to randomised treatment in accordance with the intention to treat principle.

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: There is NOT an agreement between Principal Investigators and the Sponsor (or its agents) that restricts the PI's rights to discuss or publish trial results after the trial is completed.
